channel.title: Ancient Jagex software dig-up: JAGeX Extended Module Web (plugin) Player
channel.description:
(i'm not sure if i'm posting this in the correct section or whatever, move it if you need to & pm me where it's been moved if moved) Jagex actually got its name from one of its products... (I managed to find a way to retrieve one of the oldest piece of Jagex's softwares...JAGeX Extended Module player plugin » if you want it, link below). Here's the screenshot: [img]http://i135.photobucket.com/albums/q134/mahdimc/misc/logo.gif[/img] I know, it's old as hell, i'm gonna put it on my site with a couple chiptunes i found (and/or going to make?)
the xm web plugin download is here (picture is in the "jagex" folder... if you're looking): [url=http://www.mahdisworld.net/share/xmplay.zip]http://www.mahdisworld.net/share/xmplay.zip[/url]
Now, if anyone is able to find their application development thing... i'm not sure what to call it... JAGeX...? then that would be pretty sweet. (found this file by the way on the WayBack Machine... :P)
!! NOTE !! still haven't tested it out as of July 25, 2008... I might not update even when i do test it though, hah...
